-	shop	::svbase_wsh	-1,1201:-1,1204:-1,1207:-1,1210:-1,1213:-1,1216:-1,1219:-1,1222:-1,1101:-1,1104:-1,1107:-1,1110:-1,1113:-1,1122:-1,1126:-1,1123:-1,1119:-1,1129:-1,1116:-1,1151:-1,1154:-1,1157:-1,1160:-1,1163:-1,1451:-1,1454:-1,1457:-1,1460:-1,1463:-1,1410:-1,1401:-1,1404:-1,1407:-1,1301:-1,1351:-1,1354:-1,1357:-1,1360:-1,1601:-1,1604:-1,1607:-1,1610:-1,1617:-1,1619:-1,1501:-1,1504:-1,1507:-1,1510:-1,1513:-1,1516:-1,1519:-1,1522:-1,1701:-1,1704:-1,1707:-1,1710:-1,1713:-1,1714:-1,1718:-1,1550:-1,1551:-1,1250:-1,1252:-1,1254:-1,1807:-1,1907:-1,1909:-1,1911:-1,1956:-1,1958:-1,1960:-1,13006:-1,13007:-1,13010:-1,13012:-1,13014:-1,13100:-1,13102:-1,13104:-1,13151:-1,13156:-1,13158:-1,13160:-1

//무기,방어구
-	script	 ::svbase_eshp	-1,{

	switch(select("무기:방어구")) {
	case 1:
		callshop "svbase_wsh",1;
		break;
	case 2:
		callshop "svbase_ash",1;
		break;
	}
	end;

OnInit:
	waitingroom "무기,방어구", 0;
	end;
}


-	script	 ::svbase_sell	-1,{
	callshop "svbase_ushp",2;
	end;

OnInit:
	waitingroom "판매용", 0;
	end;
}

-	script	 ::svbase_eshp2	-1,{
	callshop "svbase_ushp",1;
	end;
OnInit:
	waitingroom "기타", 0;
	end;
}

-	script	 ::cos_shop	-1,{
	mes "[" + strnpcinfo(1) + "]";
	mes "원하시는 종류를 선택해주세요.";
	mes "^FF0000※ 의상 옵션 적용 X^000000";
	close2;
	set .@cos, select("1번 의상:2번 의상:3번 의상:4번 의상:5번 의상:6번 의상:7번 의상:8번 의상:9번 의상:10번 의상:11번 의상");
	set .@cos2$, "dmltkd"+.@cos;
	callshop .@cos2$,1;
	end;

OnInit:
	waitingroom "의상", 0;
	end;
}



// 배치
//============================================================
prontera,148,174,6	duplicate(svbase_eshp)	장비자판기#prt	564
prontera,148,170,6	duplicate(svbase_eshp2)	기타자판기#prt	564
prontera,148,166,6	duplicate(cos_shop)	의상자판기#prt	564
prontera,163,163,5	duplicate(svbase_blal)	자판기#prt	564
prontera,163,166,6	duplicate(svbase_sell)	판매자판기#prt	564
